Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model.powers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Apollo
    Power: Apollo can move into an opponent worker's space by forcing their worker to the space your just vacated
    Artemis
    Power: Artemis can move one additional time, but not back to its initial space
    Athena
    Power: If Athena moved up on her last turn, opponent workers can not move up this turn.
    Atlas
    Power: Atlas can build a dome at any level
    Chronus
    Power: Chronus wins when there are at least five complete tower on the board
    Demeter
    Power: Demeter can build one additional time but not on the same space
    Hephaestus
    Power: Hephaestus can build one additional block (not dome) on top of his first block.
    Hestia
    Power: Hestia can build one additional time but non in the perimeter zone
    Minotaur
    Power: Minotaur can move into an opponent worker's space, if their worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level
    Mortal
    This class describe the natural behaviours of workers during a match.
    Pan
    Power: Pan wins if moves down at least two levels
    Poseidon
    Power: If unmoved worker is on ground level, Poseidon can build three times
    Power
    Used to connect the behaviour of the gods with the game
    Prometheus
    Power: If worker does not move up, Prometheus can build both before and after moving
    Triton
    Power: Triton can move again if he's in a perimeter block
    Zeus
    Power: Zeus can build under himself
